Helping Victims Of Charter, Tour And Other Bus Accidents

When most people think of public transportation, they probably think of city buses. But public transportation includes a wide range of options, all of which are subject to collisions like any other form of transportation. These include:

  • Central Ohio Transit Authority (COTA) buses
  • Campus buses
  • School buses
  • Tour buses
  • Charter buses
  • Taxis or ride-hailing services

If you have been injured in an accident with a bus or taxi, you need to take steps to protect your rights.

Protecting The Rights Of Those Injured In Accidents Since 1968

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our attorneys will help you obtain the compensation you need to overcome the impact your injuries have had on your life.

Over 100 Years Of Combined Experience

With over 100 years of combined legal experience, we are skilled at helping individuals injured in bus accidents through the challenges they face. From dealing with insurance companies to aggressively pursuing their rights in the courtroom, we have done it all.

Many forms of public transportation are government-owned. The government is immune from lawsuits in many cases, a key issue in many public transportation accidents. In the past, however, we have successfully maneuvered past this issue, and we will strive to do so for you.

Contact Our Knowledgeable Columbus Personal Injury Lawyers Today

We have been protecting the rights of the injured in central Ohio since 1968. We know how to hold accountable those who are responsible.

Let us help you. Turn to our skilled legal team. Schedule a free initial consultation today to talk about the bus accident, your injuries, and potential recourse options available.

Call 614-360-2706 or simply contact us online. We earn attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
